creator: jorton@redhat.com
text:
Another one spotted during debugging pid-safety stuff:

Both the graceful-stop and graceful-restart loops to SIGUSR1 children are
looping over scoreboard entries like:

        for (index = 0; index < ap_daemons_limit; ++index) {

which is more work than is necessary; they only need to loop whilst 

      index < ap_max_daemons_limit
This was fixed by people less lazy than me.
